item.description:
Come and celebrate the first evening of BostonNightLifeTV at their launch event on Monday, March 17th!

This is a great way to celebrate St Patrick's Day, meet group members AND find out more about the latest player on Boston's Nightlife scene!

AND....

*Joshua Tree, a U2 tribute band, will be on hand to perform at 8pm.*

*There will be two FREE pool tables in a private room, as well as other games and prizes.*

PLUS the camera crew from BostonNightLifeTV will be on hand to capture the party!

Free admission until 7:30pm. $10 cover afterwards.

We will meet inside the Boston Billard Club. To find the group, look for me (my picture is on the left hand side of the nightlife meetup site). Any questions please call me 646.541.0708.

See you there!

Charlie



*BostonNightlifeTV is operated by Night Life Media and is not affiliated with Boston Nightlife Meetup or Meetup.com.*
item.how_to_find_us: My pic is on the left side of this site, call my cell if you can't find the group.
item.why: Because it is the launch party for BostonNightlifeTV and you want to be in front of the camera!

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Launch Party for BostonNightLifeTV on St. Patty's Day, this Monday!
